name: Subject 42
description:
WASD/ARROW KEYS: Move

A short puzzle game we developed at Zeon Games during our studio 2-week Game Jam.

The jam theme was "My first time" and to stay true to it we tried to ask ourselves how Game and Level Design can help you find your way in a game on the first time playing it, with no written tutorials. For each of the 5 mechanics we crafted the level in a way that the player is able to figure out the puzzle by him/herself through experimentation and trial-and-error.
